text: Victor "Vic" San Andres Ziga (September 30, 1945 â€“ January 31, 2021) was a Filipino politician. He was senator in the 8th Congress from 1987 to 1992. He was an assemblyman for Albay from 1985 to 1986. He also served as Governor of Albay and cabinet minister in the Corazon Aquino administration. Ziga was born in Manila. Ziga died on January 31, 2021 in Taguig, Philippines from multiple organ failure, aged 75. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Albay (province) Category:Politicians from Bicol Region
title: Victor Ziga
